description: A catalogue containing definitions and descriptions of the resource types, resource attributes, and resource associations.

___dictionaryFunctionalLanguage.description: Formal functional language used in the dictionary.

_88series.description: Information about the series, or aggregate resource, to which a resource belongs.
_88series.title: series

___responsibleParty.description: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organization(s) associated with the cited resource.

___alternateTitle.description: Alias by which the cited resource is known.

___otherCitationDetails.description: Other information required to complete the citation that is not recorded elsewhere.

ISO 19115-2: CI_Citation > citedResponsibleParty > CI_ResponsibleParty > contact > CI_Contact > onlineResource > CI_OnlineResource

___onlineResource.description: On-line information related to the citation.

___graphic.description: Online graphic associated with the citation

___presentationForm.description: The form that the resource is presented, such as: digital map, digital document, etc.

___title.description: Name by which the cited resource is known.

___identifier.description: Identifier for the resource in the context of the citation.

___date.description: Date referenced to the cited resource.

___entity.description: Defines the structure of a discrete data object within the data resource.  The data object may be a table, dataset, or single sheet of a spreadsheet.

ISO 19115-2: FC_FeatureCatalogue > featureType > FC_FeatureType > constrainedBy > FC_Constraint > description > CharacterString

___referencedEntityCodeName.description: The entityID for the referenced (or parent) entity for this foreign key

ISO 19115-2: FC_FeatureCatalogue > featureType > FC_FeatureType > constrainedBy > FC_Constraint > description > CharacterString

___referencedAttributeCodeName.description: An array of referenced (or parent) attribute code names for this foreign key.  If the foreign key is compound key (more than one attribute compose the key) the order of the referenced attributes must allign precicely with the order and number of local attributes.

ISO 19115-2: FC_FeatureCatalogue > featureType > FC_FeatureType > constrainedBy > FC_Constraint > description > CharacterString

___localAttributeCodeName.description: An array of local (referencing or child) attribute code names for this foreign key

ISO 19115-2: FC_FeatureCatalogue > featureType > FC_FeatureType > constrainedBy > FC_Constraint > description > CharacterString

___codeName.description: The code name used to define the alternate index on the entity

ISO 19115-2: FC_FeatureCatalogue > featureType > FC_FeatureType > constrainedBy > FC_Constraint > description > CharacterString

___allowDuplicates.description: Indicates whether the index allows duplicates or values are required to be unique.  true = allow duplicates; false = values must be unique.

ISO 19115-2: FC_FeatureCatalogue > featureType > FC_FeatureType > constrainedBy > FC_Constraint > description > CharacterString

___attributeCodeName.description: An array of quoted attribute code names that together compose an alternate key set for the entity

___definition.description: A brief definition for the entity

___entityReference.description: Reference to a standard or external schema which describes the entity.

FGDC CSDGM: distinfo > stdorder > digform > digtinfo > asciistr > quotech

___quoteCharacter.description: Character used to quote fields in the data representation so that the field delimiter can be used as part of the field value. This character is typically a single quote mark or double quote mark.

ISO 19115-2: FC_FeatureCatalogue > Note: the index is written as a text description into featureType > FC_FeatureType > constrainedBy > FC_Constraint > description

___index.description: An array of objects describing alternate indexes for the entity

___entityId.description: A user provided unique ID for this entity.

ISO 19115-2: Note: the foreign key is written as a text description into FC_FeatureCatalogue > featureType > FC_FeatureType > constrainedBy > FC_Constraint

___foreignKey.description: An array of objects describing attributes whose values are restricted to values found in the domain of an attribute belonging to another table or dataset

FGDC CSDGM: distinfo > stdorder > digform > digtinfo > asciistr > numheadl

___numberOfHeaderLines.description: The number of lines at the beginning of the file before the data content actually begins.

___attribute.description: An array of objects defining the attributes for the entity

___codeName.description: The code name used to identify this entity in a database schema or application software. For spreasheets this would likely be the sheet name.

___commonName.description: The name commonly used to identify this entity

___alias.description: An array of quoted strings providing alternate names used to identify this entity

FGDC CSDGM: distinfo > stdorder > digform > digtinfo > asciistr > dfwidthd

___fieldSeparatorCharacter.description: The character which indicates the end of the data field contents.

ISO 19115-2: Note: the primary key is written as a text description into FC_FeatureCatalogue > featureType > FC_FeatureType > constrainedBy > FC_Constraint > description

___primaryKeyAttributeCodeName.description: An array of quoted attribute code names that together compose the primary key set for the entity

___contactId.description: Identifier matching a contactId in the main contact array.

___organizationMembers.description: Identifies individuals that have an association with an organization contact.

___roleExtent.description: The area or period of time for which the role is valid.

___party.description: Identifies all the contacts associated with the role.

___role.description: Function performed by the contact in the current context.

___responsibleParty.description: Name, address, country, and telecommunications address of person or organization having primary responsibility for the intellectual content of this dictionary.

___description.description: A free text description of the contents of the data dictionary.

___recommendedUse.description: Description of kind(s) of use to which this dictionary may be put.

___locale.description: Defines the language and country of origin in which the data dictionary is written.  E.g. 'eng; USA', 'eng; UK', 'esp; MEX'.

$eref.description: Localised language(s) and characterset(s) used within the resource being described.

___language.description: Language(s) used within the resource. Should be a valid ISO 639-3 code.

___country.description: Designation of the specific country of the locale language(ISO 3166-1).

___characterSet.description: Full name of the character encoding standard used by the resource(see http://www.iana.org/assignments/character-sets/character-sets.xhtml).

___dictionaryIncludedWithResource.description: Indication of whether or not the data dictionary is included with the resource.

___domain.description: A list of permissable values used to constrain an attribute's value.  A single domain may be assigned to multiple attributes in a table or database.

$eref.description: A list of permissable values used to constrain an attribute's value.  A single domain may be assigned to multiple attributes in a table or database.

_88domainItem.description: An array of member objects that enumerate and define the valid values for a domain.

ISO 19115-2: FC_FeatureCatalogue > featureType > FC_FeatureType > carrierOfCharacteristics > FC_FeatureAttribute > listedValue > FC_ListedValue > label

___name.description: A descriptive name associated with a domain value

ISO 19115-2: FC_FeatureCatalogue > featureType > FC_FeatureType > carrierOfCharacteristics > FC_FeatureAttribute > listedValue > FC_ListedValue > definition

___definition.description: A brief definition for the domain item

ISO 19115-2: FC_FeatureCatalogue > featureType > FC_FeatureType > carrierOfCharacteristics > FC_FeatureAttribute > listedValue > FC_ListedValue > label

___value.description: A descriptive name associated with a domain value

___reference.description: Reference to a standard to a standard which contains a definition for the domain item.

___codeName.description: The code or 'lookup table' name for the domain used in the database schema definitions.

___description.description: A brief description of the domain including identification of any established sources used in creating the list of domain items.

___commonName.description: A short common name for the domain.

___domainItem.description: An array of member objects that enumerate and define the valid values for a domain.

___domainId.description: A user provided unique ID for this domain.  The ID will be used to locate the domain in the domain array.

___domainReference.description: Reference to a standard or list which contains the members of an established set of valid values.

___subject.description: Identifies the scope of the data dictionary. E.g. 'database', 'dataset', 'table'.
